description.integration: Automate document processing & data extraction workflows for document-heavy business processes like accounts payable, order processing & insurance.

ai_description.integration: The Nanonets activity automates document processing and data extraction in workflows for document-heavy business processes such as accounts payable, order processing, and insurance by utilizing Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and Intelligent Document Processing, making it ideal for scenarios requiring efficient and accurate data extraction from various document types.
